intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive! Take part in the historic and intense tank battles of Operation Cobra, pitting the Sherman M4A2 against the formidable Tiger II!
description:
Operation Cobra, the battle that changed history! Amidst a brutal battlefield filled with gunfire, explosions, blood and mud, your every move now determines the fate of the war. Engage in fierce tank battles between the Sherman and the Tiger and experience high-stakes, strategic combat. With photorealistic graphics and immersive gameplay, you will be the hero of this historic moment. Experience the fight for world peace and freedom firsthand in the ultimate FPS!

・Operation Cobra features intense battles between Sherman M4A2 and Tiger II tanks!
・Hyper-realistic environments and ultra-high-definition graphics capture every detail, from bullets to billowing smoke on the battlefield.
・Join Operation Cobra and take on special missions as part of the front line.
・Unmatched Realism! Enjoy immersive gameplay powered by a 3D soundscape and advanced physics engine.
・Stunning visuals! Realistic graphics perfectly capture the light and shadows of the battlefield for maximum immersion.
・Hide behind burning tanks or destroyed buildings and engage in tense firefights just like in real combat.
・Enjoy strategic gameplay by utilizing the unique abilities of three character classes: Assault, Support and Sniper.
・Achieve victory with precise aiming and an advanced targeting system that simulates the handling of real combat weapons!
・Experience the thrill of teamwork and cooperative play with your allies.

Lead your squad to victory in some of the most iconic moments of World War II. Military fans will be thrilled by the authentic combat, the excitement of precision marksmanship, and the stunning 3D effects and graphics that bring the global conflict to life. Don't miss World at War: Cobra, the ultimate team-based single-player FPS available exclusively on Nintendo Switch™!

Synopsis 
Summer 1944, seven weeks after the Normandy landings in France. As British and Canadian forces pinned down the Germans around Caen, General Bradley's U.S. First Army prepared for a massive breakout: Operation Cobra. The stage was set in the bocage country of Normandy and northwestern France, including places like Brécourt, Saint-Lô, and Carentan. After repeated delays due to bad weather, the operation began on July 25 with thousands of Allied bombers carpet-bombing German defenses.

The U.S. VII and VIII Corps spearheaded the advance, and the Germans, short on men and materiel, struggled to mount an effective defense. The main American tank, the highly maneuverable Sherman M4A2, leads the charge alongside infantry. The Germans counter with the formidable Tiger II, known for its powerful cannon and thick armor. The narrow streets of Brécourt, the ruins of Saint-Lô and the fields of Carentan were the scene of fierce tank battles.

On July 26, the Americans secured the Le Mesnil-Herman crossroads and reached Coutances on the 27th. Despite resistance from German 88mm anti-aircraft guns and Tiger IIs, the Allied assault quickly broke through the defenses. Sherman tanks, working closely with infantry, smashed through the German lines, forcing the enemy to retreat across the Seine.

Operation Cobra marks a turning point on the Normandy front, allowing the Allies to begin their advance to liberate the world. Now players must join the chaos, strategy, and courage of the battlefield alongside Sherman tanks and fight for the freedom of the world.
